review: My sugar level since 4 years has been very high. Dr in corporate hospital advices me to take insulin shot.luckily I met dr maathan for second opinion. He adjusted the tablet dose and few diet changes. Now my sugar is normal. God bless u doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My uncle was advised coronary angio since his TMT is positive in vijaywada.
However we wanted to get it done with dr maathan.
But sir checked all reports and told us angiogram is not needed and TMT is false positive.
It's been 5years now and uncle is safe and healthy
Thanks dr for ur genuine advice

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctors in my town scared me that I have critical heart problems.i was very tense.my friend recommended to meet dr maathaan.he tested me and reassured that it was not cardiac pain and gave me few tablets for a week.now iam very happy and healthy.
**** ****** ****** I have met
Will strongly recommend to all my friends
Sir will listen patiently to the health issues and does good recommendation for improving health issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: When I found  Dr Ganesh on Practi while I was trying to find a doctor to consult, i went through the feedback shared by his earlier patients. when I met him I realised that every good word mentioned about the doctor is 200 percent true. so far I haven't met a doctor who is as friendly and as patient. he listened to my complete list of issues that I was going through without stopping me. his approach towards the problem not to scare me away was so thoughtful and kind. he spoke to me like a normal family member would do explaining the reasons why I was experiencing the sickness. he is a gem of a doctor. In true sense a doctor who is doing justice to his responsibility. thank you doctor Ganesh. i feel better with the treatment you had provided. my gratitude.

*** **** ************ ** ********* *** *** I have referred many friends who are stable now. Does not prescribe unnecessary tests or medicines. My blood sugar, bp and cholesterol are completely under control only due to this kind doctor.

Dr maathaan is treating my high BP since last 12 years. Now iam on just one tablet with excellent BP control. Iam sure until iam with Dr maathaan care iam going to lead a long healthy life. He treats my sugar and cholesterol also. The reports are normal. Good bless Dr maathaan
I come from adilabad to meet him every 3 months and I have referred many patients to Dr and all are very satisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: visited the doctor for my mom, as she is suffering from hypertension from past 2 years and doctor have suggested appropriate medications based on symptoms. right now , her BP is under control and she can perform her daily routine effectively. thank you so much doctor for your treatment and kind gesture.

Approached the doctor for fever, he asked for blood test at his lab, charged nearly Rs. 5000/- for all the blood test. Didn't conclude with anything after the blood test. Later checked it at another clinic, turned out to be corona.
The entire clinic setup looked like money printing setup to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Treatment starts from 2d echo to end less tests and reports are not given until we asks that to with out print images and manually written with out invoice number and GST details. We feel hypertension patients with hypertension after seeing the bills. 
By chance if you visit here better take medicines and tests out side.

tags: Wait time,
review:
I visited doctor as my father has BP problem. he is 75 years old. Took app. for 10:15 am. confirmed by practo. As per standard guidelines, 30 mins wait time is expected when rush. visited gul mohar park clinic at 10:30 am, to my surprise doctor time for clinic is 11 am. One of the causes for frustration. I decided to wait for doctor to turn up at 11 am with my father (75 years old). Doctor did not turn up, waited till 11:15 am. Either practo is at fault or doctor is unprofessional. I reached out practo for help, they stated to contact me back after consulting doctor in 5 mins. No call back from practo. No compensation too for such a frustration!!

working day turned bad *** ** **********
Doctor was good but their is a no system and not maintaining the q system properly we request the doctor to maintain the q system to enter inside the doctor cabin for check up

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Ganesh mathan sir did a complex stenting in my friends mom who had critical block in heart. Doctors in Vijayawada had advised bypass surgery as block was in critical junction.
But Dr mathan did the stenting successfully.
Thank u sir
Dr. Ganesh Mathan is friendly and patiently answers your questions. Explains things in an easy to understand manner. Strongly recommend him

Doctor was good at identifying and explained clearly about my hear condition.
I wou recommend this doctor .

review: Most friendly doctor I came across in my life. He explained in the words that I can understand & didn't write bulk pills.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
He is patient and took my notes so well , thank you doctor for your time !! It would be good if you have some more additional timings to visit
Doctor is excellent listens to all the health  concerns and discuss .staff are friendly .felt confident in receiving medical .
Doctor manthan is very polite and friendly. I like the way he explain us about the heart conditions and treatment. **** ********* ** A pocket friendly price which is not too high.

Prescribed **** medication and handled the issue well.
Will recommend

review: Very experienced doctor. Explained everything to the patient as well as family members about the  condition and action plan. I took my mother 84 years. Very much satisfied with his approach. Very reasonable. I defiantly suggest him.

My Father went through angiplasy stenting at sunshine hospitals. I am very happy with him. He takes time to understand and explain the whole situation. Very polite and prefessional and excellent skills.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Finest doctor I have seen.
So caring and best treatment with minimal medicines
I was suggested urgent stenting for my heart block 5 years ago
But Dr mathan cured me with tablets alone 
Very ethical and uncomercial doctor who wants only to help patients 
Treats lots of patients for free too if they are poor
God bless

Although the doctor is friendly, there are many issues that you might face over there.**** *** ****** ****** **** * ***** ********** *********** They won't tell you before doing a particular test and then suddenly charge you for the same. You won't get any printout of the report neither is billed

3. They will charge you more amount than what is mentioned on practo for visiting the doctor

4. All in all not at all satisfied

tags: Wait time,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: Based on so many reviews, I booked appointment at 10 Am prior 1 day, assuming doctor will be available on time. When I reached, clinic is not yet opened. I checked with the lady who was opening the clinic that what time doctor comes to hospital. She mentioned after 10:30( no guarantee). Why do they have slot at 10 AM, when doctor is not sure about his timings. My whole day planning to visit doctor went to vain
reply_text: Sometime my morning rounds in hospital inpatients gets longer.. sorry for inconvenience

review: Practo fee and  again charged consultation fee at the office. Too many tests and no hygiene by staff while collecting blood.
reply_text:
Dear sir
If repeat consultation charges were paid by you.. it is a mistake. U can come to collect it. 

Test are done based on the history and findings to come to a diagnosis. Many times it helps for proper treatment. Without tests, if something gets worse , the patients will suffer more and it becomes a medical negligence. ( it’s sorry state of affairs in medical practise.. tests done- patient crib, tests not done and misdiagnosed- patients crib more)

Regarding blood test hygiene- I will look into

Thanks for bringing up this issue
